==Translingual==
{{Han simplified forms|眾|衆|众}}

===Alternative forms===
* {{l|mul|眾}}

===Etymology===
Variant of {{m|mul|眾}}, with bottom replaced by {{m|mul|乑}} (similar to unrelated {{m|mul|衣}} and {{m|mul|𠂢}}).

Current form is graphically {{Han compound|血|乑|t2=crowd, multitude}} – bottom is originally 3 people, hence “crowd”, though top is unrelated to 血, being originally {{m|mul|罒||network|sc=Hani}}.
